divs: Sighting Detailsdriving approx.25 miles so. of the object driving from east to west then turningnorth.The lights were bright and appeared brighter then any city lights.Thelight was rectangular with lights in thte center being slightly duller then the2 larger lights pulsating on either side of the object.It hovered in the air forapprox. 30 min.Unfortunately we were unable tpo follow the object at this time.Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
Summary: large rectagular light with 2 large lights on eith
